preferences.name: UMAMI_API_CLIENT_ENDPOINT
preferences.title: Umami Endpoint
preferences.description: The endpoint of your Umami API. Example: https://{yourserver}/api/

preferences.name: UMAMI_API_CLIENT_USER_ID
preferences.title: Umami User ID (Self-Hosted)
preferences.description: The USER_ID of the User performing the API calls. Permission restrictions will apply based on application settings.

preferences.name: UMAMI_API_CLIENT_SECRET
preferences.title: Umami Client Secret (Self-Hosted)
preferences.description: A random string used to generate unique values. This needs to match the APP_SECRET used in the Umami application.

preferences.name: UMAMI_API_KEY
preferences.title: Umami API Key (Cloud)
preferences.description: A unique string provided by Umami Cloud.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
